name: Cellular Evaluation Plugin
title: Cellular Evaluation Plugin
description: Plugin to generate evaluation metrics for region-wise comparison of ground truth and predicted images.
author: Vishakha Goyal (vishakha.goyal@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: GTDir
inputs.description: Ground truth input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: PredDir
inputs.description: Predicted input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: individualData
inputs.description: Boolean to calculate individual image statistics.

inputs.name: individualSummary
inputs.description: Boolean to calculate summary of individual images.

inputs.name: totalStats
inputs.description: Boolean to calculate overall statistics across all images.

inputs.name: totalSummary
inputs.description: Boolean to calculate summary across all images.

inputs.name: radiusFactor
inputs.description: Importance of radius/diameter to find centroid distance. Should be between (0,2].

ui.title: Ground Truth Images
ui.description: Ground truth input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

ui.title: Predicted Images
ui.description: Predicted input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

ui.title: Individual Image Data
ui.description: Boolean to calculate individual image statistics.

ui.title: Individual Image Summary
ui.description: Boolean to calculate summary of individual images.

ui.title: Total Statistics
ui.description: Boolean to calculate overall statistics across all images.

ui.title: Summary for all Images
ui.description: Boolean to calculate summary across all images.

ui.title: Radius Factor
ui.description: Importance of radius/diameter to find centroid distance. Should be between (0,2].
